TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAttribute extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an attribute that is associated with the subject of a .

span.span: Represents an attribute that is associated with the subject of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會對應到已在 OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中定義之 `` XML 項目。The class corresponds to the `` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification. 執行個體會包含 之主體的 宣告。A instance contains claims for the subject of a . 例如， 可能會包含 `Over21` 宣告，這個宣告的型別會指定於 屬性中，而宣告的資源會指定成為在 屬性中之集合的一個成員。For example, a might contain an `Over21` claim, whose type would be specified in the property and whose resource would be specified as a member of the collection in the property. 當呼叫 方法時，這個 `Over21` 宣告會加入 傳回的授權原則中。When the method is called, this `Over21` claim is added to the authorization policy that is returned by returned from by the . 當 屬性包含多個項目時，則每個項目都會傳回一個宣告。When the property contains multiple elements then one claim is returned for each element. 在 SAML 物件階層架構中的 位置是： position in the SAML object hierarchy is: ## Examples [!code-csharp[SamlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/samlattribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SamlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/samlattribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式 (Constructor)，即可將宣告轉換為 SAML 屬性。Use this constructor to convert a claim into a SAML attribute. 為了要轉換為 SAML 屬性 (Attribute)， 屬性 (Property) 必須是 、 屬性 (Property) 的型別必須是 ，而且 屬性 (Property) 必須使用 `namespace/name` 格式。To be converted to a SAML attribute, the property must be , the property must be of type , and the property must be in the format `namespace/name`. 下表指定 `claim` 參數會將 、 以及 等屬性設定成哪些值。The following table specifies what the `claim` parameter sets the , , and the properties to. |屬性Property|用來設定屬性的 `claim` 參數屬性。Property of the `claim` parameter used to set the property| |--------------|----------------------------------------------------------------| || 屬性的值會加入集合中。The value of the property is added to the collection.| || 屬性中最後一個 '/' 字元之後的字串部分。The portion of the string after the last '/' character in the property.| || 屬性中最後一個 '/' 字元之前的字串部分。The portion of the string before the last '/' character in the property.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定關於安全性權杖所表示主體的屬性。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions that can specify an attribute about the subject represented by the security token. 使用 方法，即可將 SAML 屬性轉換成宣告集合。Use the method to convert the SAML attribute into a set of claims.
